summary: Frontend testing attempted for Founder Intelligence Platform - Authentication system blocking access to protected routes, unable to test main application features

authentication_issues.issue: Session token 'test_session_main_token_123' returns 401 Unauthorized for all authenticated API calls
authentication_issues.impact: Cannot test backend functionality with provided test credentials
authentication_issues.symptoms: All API calls with Bearer token authentication return 401 status code

authentication_issues.issue: Session cookie authentication completely non-functional - direct navigation to protected routes always redirects to landing page
authentication_issues.symptoms: Setting session_token cookie with various configurations (httpOnly, secure, sameSite) does not allow access to /dashboard, /upload, /insights, or /narrative routes
authentication_issues.root_cause: Test session token not recognized by backend + frontend Auth Context not properly handling cookie-based authentication
attempts_made: Set session_token cookie with httpOnly=true, secure=true, sameSite=None

oauth_flow_issues.issue: Get Started Free and Sign in with Google buttons redirect to external OAuth service (auth.emergentagent.com) instead of using test session
oauth_flow_issues.impact: Cannot test authenticated features without going through real OAuth flow

passed_tests: Main heading 'Upload raw data. Get investor-grade insight.' displays correctly
Sign in with Google button is present and enabled
Get Started Free button is present and enabled
All 4 feature sections display correctly (Strategic Metrics Engine, AI Signal Interpretation, Growth Intelligence, Funding Narratives)
Responsive design works on mobile (390x844) and tablet (768x1024) viewports
Page layout and styling appear correct across different screen sizes
No JavaScript errors or console warnings on landing page
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Authentication system is completely broken. The test session token 'test_session_main_token_123' is not working for either backend APIs (401 errors) or frontend authentication (cookie not recognized). Need to: 1) Verify test user and session are properly created in MongoDB database, 2) Fix frontend cookie authentication handling in AuthContext, 3) Ensure session validation works on backend. Cannot test any protected routes or main application features until authentication is resolved.
success_percentage: Backend: 0% (authentication blocked), Frontend: 20% (only landing page accessible, all protected routes blocked)
